sections.heading: punishment; prohibited.Corporal punishment shall be prohibited in public schools
sections.text: SourceLaws 1988, LB 316, ยง 1;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-4,140;Laws 1996, LB 900, ยง 99.AnnotationsCorporal punishment, as prohibited in this section, is reasonably understood to be the infliction of bodily pain as a penalty
